Content.en:
This is a bit of [color=orange]testing[/color] dialogue {speed multiplier=2.0}with various [tornado radius=3.0 freq=2.0 connected=1]functions[/tornado]. I wonder if it works quite right... Still needs{pause duration=ahaa} some padding {speed multiplier=0.5}to [color=lightblue]eventually[/color] {hold}scroll downwards somewhat, that would be neat.
Here's a new paragraph, how is that{expression name=WINK speaker=true} looking? Is everything showing properly with the right amount of padding?{swapsplit}And [pulse freq=1.0 color=#ffffff40 ease=-2.0]here's[/pulse] the {speed multiplier=1.0}second entry. All's going well it seem-{shake strength=5.0 duration=0.0 fade=2.0}{sound name=_Test/TestAudio}{expression name=WORRIED speaker=false} huh? {expression name=WORRIED speaker=true}{pause duration=1.0}{shake strength=5.0 duration=2.0 fade=0.5}{sound name=_Test/TestAudio}{pause duration=0.2}{sound name=_Test/TestAudio}{pause duration=0.5}{sound name=_Test/TestAudio}{pause duration=1.3} WHAT?????{pause duration=1.0}{end}
